title: Mercury Transit in the 7th House for Leo Ascendant
summary: Mercury transiting your seventh house brings communication to the forefront of partnerships and public dealings. Dialogue, negotiation, and intellectual exchange become central themes in relationships. You seek mental compatibility and clarity in commitments, contracts, and collaborations. Conversations can define bonds, for better or worse. When guided consciously, this transit supports balanced agreements, improved relationship understanding, and mutually beneficial partnerships through clear, respectful communication.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong need for dialogue and feedback.

closing: Mercury in the 7th house highlights the power of words in partnerships. When communication is fair and clear, relationships and agreements flourish.
